title: tiny ass paintings
desc:
For one night only get your ass portrait painted live in the lobby of (RiffRaff) Kino. tiny ass paintings (Ty Wardwell of Buttermilk Films) will be present to snap a photo of your ass with in instant camera and in 30 minutes you'll have your very own miniature painting of your very own ass. It's a perfect gift for a lover or a fitting souvenier of your visit to Porny Days 2025.Â 

If you're familiar with Buttermilk Films, it won't surprise you that Ty Wardwell has been a life-long ass enthusiast. Since 2017 they've been making tiny ass paintings. The paintings are tiny. The asses are anything butt! The work is a celebration of bums and all their functions, especially their capacity to make people smile. Find them at a weekend market on your next visit to Berlin, or explore the tiny ass digital universe at tinyasspaintings.com.
